availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident. Native of Wurtemburg, Germany. Married to Salome “Sallie” Iehl Votteler in Jefferson County on October 14, 1861. Father of William Votteler. Resident of Louisville, Kentucky, in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Enumeration District 139, p. 105C.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, 1860-1867, Film #000482709, p. 188.
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1965), KDLA, Film 7016218: All Counties, 1911-1965, 1918-1919, File #10635, p. 840 of 3361 of microfilm.
Find A Grave, "Christian G Votteler (unknown-1919)," Memorial 146088719, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/146088719 (accessed June 9, 2020).
KYR-0001-004-1388.
